full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Geotechnical and Topographical Consultant Services, National Capital Region

#### Reference Information

* Reference Number: PW-22-01010907
* Solicitation Number: WA229002
* Publication Date: October 21, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 3, 2022, at 14:00:00

#### Scope of Work

The Government of Canada, through Defence Construction Canada (DCC), is seeking to establish two (2) separate lists of consultants interested in providing quick response professional services to meet Department of National Defence (DND) requirements in the National Capital Region (NCR). The consultants will provide services in the areas of:

* Geotechnical Engineering
* Topographical Land Surveying

#### Requirements and Selective Criteria

* Only firms with offices located within a 50 km radius of HMCS Carleton (79 Prince of Wales Dr., Ottawa, ON) will be considered for inclusion on the list.
* Commissions are expected to be valued between $5,000 and $50,000 and should not exceed $100,000. The total amount of opportunities under each professional service list will not exceed $500,000.
* Selected firms must have the capability to produce deliverables in both English and French.

#### Contracting Details

* Security Requirements: None
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR) and Quebec (except NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR) and Ontario (except NCR)

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Stephanie Tanguay
* Contact Email: Stephanie.Tanguay@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: Not provided

#### Location

* Defence Construction Canada, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: November 3, 2022, at 14:00:00
* Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Contract End Date: Not specified

Please note that the tender has already expired and this announcement is for reference purposes only.

#### Access to Tender Documents

Tender documents are available through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
